data.name: toolStripButtonStereonet.ToolTipText
data.value: Stereo Net Thi module draws stereonet projections

data.name: listBox.ToolTip
data.value: Crystal list is displayed here. To add a new crystal, set the new crystal data in the 'Crystal Information' panel and click the 'Add' button. To modify a crystal data, select the target crystal, modify it in the 'Crystal Information panel', and click the 'Replace' button. To remove a crystal from the list, select the target crystal and click the 'Delete' button. To delete all crystals in the list, click the 'All Clear' button.
